Salesforce Components - FirestoreImportPayments
Overview    Classes    Enums    Interfaces    Triggers    SObjects    Groups    Index




Class FirestoreImportPayments

public class FirestoreImportPayments
extends FirestoreService.ImportRecordsLogic

Extends class ImportRecordsLogic to implement logic to process payments from Firestore

Changes

04/03/2021 Initial version. 04/07/2021 Adds logic to calculate the Stripe processing fees. 06/03/2021 Methods now use class FirestoreService instead of FirestoreController. 07/25/2021 Support for getting refunds. 08/01/2021 Make sure payments are within the date range if provided. 10/31/2023 Saves device information. 03/05/2024 The account currency is now used to define the payment currency. 03/08/2024 Stripe processing fees are calculated for international payments. 03/10/2024 Adds logic to calculate the conversion rate and processing fees in a foreign currency. 08/28/2024 Use abbreviation to make sure fields don't go over the max length.
